plot outline: Renowned Indian film director R .Sarath's Parudeesa is the, story of a revolutionary priest, who lived in a remote Indian village. He is the real follower of Christ trying to make changes in the society , during his mission he is facing oppositions from the community itself. the bishop follows a conventional path in everything, the priest is of a progressive approach. The cook at the nearby convent, unmarried young woman plays a significant role in their life . The unusual story is treated in a satirical way. Thampy antony, Sreenivasan, Jagathy Sreekumar and Shweta Menon are playing leading characters in 'Parudeesa'. The film Parudeesa is produced under the banner of Kayal films by producer Thampy Antony. Screen play and dialogues are written by Vinu Abraham, the young writer. R Sarath handles the megaphone of this film titled as Parudeesa, Parudeesa is the malayalam word used for the word, Paradise.
title: Parudeesa
plot: Renowned Indian film director R .Sarath's _Parudeesa_ (qv) is the, story of a revolutionary priest, who lived in a remote Indian village. He is the real follower of Christ trying to make changes in the society , during his mission he is facing oppositions from the community itself. the bishop follows a conventional path in everything, the priest is of a progressive approach. The cook at the nearby convent, unmarried young woman plays a significant role in their life . The unusual story is treated in a satirical way. Thampy antony, Sreenivasan, Jagathy Sreekumar and Shweta Menon are playing leading characters in '_Parudeesa_ (qv)'. The film _Parudeesa_ (qv) is produced under the banner of Kayal films by producer Thampy Antony. Screen play and dialogues are written by Vinu Abraham, the young writer. R Sarath handles the megaphone of this film titled as _Parudeesa_ (qv), _Parudeesa_ (qv) is the malayalam word used for the word, Paradise.::Anonymous
